Description: Bottle (medicine). Flower and inscription. Made of enamelled ceramic, porcelain.
Bibliographic references: Gardner Wilkinson 1854 / A Popular Account of the Ancient Egyptians (p. 69)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
Acquisition notes: Bought from a man in Coptos, whilst travelling along the Nile. See John Francis Davis "The Chinese," 1836, page 243.
